attributes.action: Debate on the rip off car insurance increases and stop unjustified increases.
attributes.additional_details: To stop a blatant misuse of their position as insurance providers and is something a law abiding citizen must have. This will cause more not to bother with car insurance. We need an official body to stop this rip off scenario that is taking place.
attributes.background: Hold the car insurance companies to account and make them justify the ridiculous increases.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
Establish a Comission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises
